name: ninja-mode
description: Extension for enabling dark mode on any website in Chromium based browsers.
author: Boris Diakur (https://borisdiakur.de)

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cp -r src build/src && cp -r icons build/icons && cp manifest-ff.json build/manifest.json && cd build && zip -r -FS ../ninja-mode.zip *
